room_title: Escape room "Catacombs" by Brainstorm Escape Games in Atlanta
review: We have previously done the Area 51 room, and now went back with a group of six 12-year-olds for a birthday and did the Catacombs. It was just as fun as Area 51, maybe a little more challenging but the set up was so creative.  Everyone enjoyed it, and they made it out (with a little help from our game master!).

room_title: Escape room "Catacombs" by Brainstorm Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Challenging and a real brain thinker but overall a great way to spend a fun night!

room_title: Escape room "Catacombs" by Brainstorm Escape Games in Atlanta
review: My husband and I had a grown-up's night out! It was great playing with friends. Also the beginning video was funny. I had so much fun, I look forward to going back again soon!
